description:
A research involving graduates of the Harvard Business School in a certain year revealed that 84% of them had no goals for their earnings, 13% of them had goals though they were unwritten and 3% of them had clearly written out goals with a definite plan to attain them.

Ten years later, it was observed that the 13% who had goals though unwritten were earning a 100% more than those who had no goals at all. However, more shocking is the fact that the 3% who had clearly written out and well planned goals were earning a whooping ten times more than their colleagues who had no goals whatsoever as well as those who did but didn’t have them written down.

DISCOVER HOW TO MAKE THE MOST OF YOUR LIFE THIS YEAR

  • A New Year taboo you should break
  • 2 Kinds of goals you should set
  • New Year blunders to avoid
  • How to start your year for maximum productivity
  • 2 Major reasons why people fail
  • 7 Qualities of Highly Successful People

A Step By Step Guide to Having Your Best Year Ever!

Verifiable statistics shows that only 8% of Americans who make New Year resolutions ever succeed at keeping to them at the end of the year. On the other hand, another report shows that only a minute 3% of the entire world populace account for the wealthiest people on earth today. Amazingly, there are neither the most talented nor the most industrious! With this course you too can step up your game and join the ever growing list of successful, high achieving men and women who are making the most of their lives around the globe and consequently making the news.

Content and Overview

With this hands on 21 lecture course that comprises of 13 videos, 1 audio, 6 Slides, 2 PDF documents and a notepad (all downloadable) you will walk away with all you need to know to be distinguished from the majority who may never succeed in life…

You will learn how to avoid a New Year trend that most people follow yet end up failing. Avoid the mistake that the overzealous in life make even with their good intentions. Avoid the pitfall that makes 25% of people fail with their New Year resolutions within the first week! And also be able to end your years with true joy, satisfaction and fulfillment.

At the end of this course, you will be able to plan and execute your plans for your business, career, family, relationships and indeed your entire life like the "Pros". You will also join the few who are truly satisfied, fulfilled and are excited about their lives.
title: 30 Minutes to Your Best Year Ever
